article_title: US backs UN Security Council vote on Gaza aid boost
sentence: Earlier  this  week,  Hamas  said  the  number  of  people  killed  in  Gaza  in  10  weeks  of  fighting  had  passed  20,000.

article_title: US backs UN Security Council vote on Gaza aid boost
sentence: More  than  240  Israeli  hostages  were  captured  on  7  October  when  Hamas  broke  through  the  heavily  guarded  perimeter  with  Israel,  killing  1,200  people.
